description: This file defines a React component for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, which manages the game state, renders the game board, and handles user interactions.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main component that renders the Tic Tac Toe game interface and manages game state.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: Functional component that represents a single square in the Tic Tac Toe board.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the game based on the current state of the squares.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events on the squares, updates the game state accordingly.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.
